title: The Person Behind the Pixels
text: I'm a Frontend Architect & Software Engineer based in Prague, Czech Republic. My journey in the world of development began with a robust Computer Science education. Over the years, I've immersed myself in various frontend projects, honing my skills and embracing the challenges of crafting dynamic, user-friendly websites. My experience spans a diverse range of web development endeavors, where I've consistently leveraged collaboration and creative problem-solving to build impactful digital experiences. As I continue this journey, I am excited about contributing to innovative frontend solutions and collaborating with talented professionals to create exceptional websites.
imageAlt: Coding in front of a computer screen

title: My Web Development Philosophy
text: As a Frontend Architect & Software Engineer, my philosophy is centered on developing intuitive, visually engaging, and highly functional websites. I believe the bridge between designers and developers is crucial. I work to strengthen it, delving into both worlds to create better products. I bring 3D design to the web, blending visual art with code - a skill not many embrace yet.
imageAlt: Looking at the code and thinking
